channel.title: How to update firmware - HL7800
channel.description:
My mangOH Red is running the following:
``` ati9 HL7800.4.6.9 HL78xx.4.6.9.4.RK_02_01_02_00_137.20210615 2021/06/15 21:02:09 IMEI-SV: 3546160901940314 Legato RTOS: 18.09.6.ALT1250.rc8 2021/05/18 20:22:09 atSwi: 44.01 UBOOT: 01.03 Apps: RKAPP_02_01_02_00_120__c2a0a2a6e5dd44ea4710b32fe98e69dc72bab7ce MAC: ALT1250_02_01_02_00_123_FW PHY: 12.50.265649 PMP: 277291 SBUB: 0 SBFW: 0 RPuK: FPuK: RBUB: 0 RBFW: 0
OK ```
I assume that's not the latest firmware - is it? How do I update the firmware when an HL7800 is involved? All the guides I keep finding are for WP series - not HL series.
Thx!

item.title: How to update firmware - HL7800
item.dc:creator: allynsnook
item.description:
Looks like I did already update the firmware. 4.6.9.4 appears to be the latest. Found the instructions for the HL7800 here: https://source.sierrawireless.com/resources/airprime/software/hl7800-firmware/hl78xx-firmware-4,-d-,6,-d-,9,-d-,4/#sthash.4srFDCt3.YG0tx7AO.dpbs

Read full topic
